title: Venetia 101 Facets Realistic Supreme Princess Cut 1 or 1.5 Carat Simulated Diamond Ring Band Set 925 Silver Platinum Plated BSQ
features: This contemporary ring and band set features a 101 facets princess cut diamond. It is very difficult to find a CZ princess cut that looks like real diamond, but we had managed to achieve this result with our 101 facets stones. Crafted with solid sterling silver and stamped S925. Comes in 1 carat and 1.5 carat.

The Princess cut is the second most popular cut shape for diamonds. With more chevrons and precise symmetry, our Star Cross Princess Cut diamond simulant is able to return more light, and hence is full of fire and brilliance.
We achieved this flawless precise symmetrical cutting by using high-tech computer-aided lasers With 101 facets, It will sparkle in low dim light which is not possible with CZ or crystals.

Our diamond simulants are created in a laboratory under ideal conditions. Thus there are no impurities like trace minerals or black spot such as those in real diamonds. They are flawless internally and externally, with an absolute colorless D, hence they are able to exhibit more brilliance than a real diamond. And our rings will not turn your fingers green like others will.

Our stones are realistic looking, full of fire and sparkle, yet they only cost at fraction of the real thing. Why would you get anything else? Comes in formal ring box with our brand name Venetia and velvet interior.
description: Diamonds are commonly assessed in terms of the “4 Cs”: Cut, Clarity, Color, and Carat.

A good cut has a high refractive index, giving the diamond its brilliance (how shiny), dispersion (how fiery), and scintillation (how glittery).The princess cut is the second most popular cut shape for diamonds. Most top grade princess cuts diamonds have 78 facets, and princess cut CZ usually come in 45 facets. We have achieved an amazing 101 facets for our princess cut stones. With more facets, our diamond simulants are able to reflect more light, making them full of fire, and brilliance and glitter.
Our diamond simulants are created in a laboratory under ideal conditions. Hence there are no blemishes or impurities such as trace minerals or black spot that could be found in real diamonds.

Our diamond simulants are created absolute colorless D, similar to top-grade real diamonds. This is the most desirable color as its complete transparency allows the most fire and sparkle. We have achieved an exceptional 101 Princess cut with our latest computer-aided laser cutting technology, which makes our stones 30 percent brighter than other diamonds. Because our stones deliver high brilliance, fire and sparkle, they are superior in reflecting the maximum amount of light to the eye. They offer edge-to-edge brilliance with explosions of white and colored light, even in low light conditions i.e. from across the room at a party or in a candle-lit restaurant.
